availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married Alcey Jones. Father of William Jones, Milton Jones, Alfred Jones, Sarah Jones, Robert H. Jones, Lucinda Jones, Levi Jones, and Thomas Jones. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Eddyville, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 368; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 40; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 2, p. 36.
